channel.title: Desolation - 2 Worlds with shit loads of fun!
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3176974/6mW1ClB.png[/img]
Hello Mopar. I will be starting a Project called Desolution. I have been playing RSPS's for a long time, and i ever dreamed of having my own and having success with it, like NR, Battle-Scape and many others. I would be using Epicurus, cause it has features what others dont have. I will Update this thread Daily, i made this Thread while i am on Phone ! :[)
I am in need of a Web + Client Developer ! Just check the Top of the thread for the formular !
Images
Will add Updates after i got some nice ones
Developers
Lirimoo - PHP/Server Developer [Spot Left] - Server Developwr [Spot Left] - PHP/HTML/CSS Developer [Spot Left] - Client Developer
UPDATE LOG - LIRIMOO
03/24/2013 - Started Project 03/24/2013 - Added a new Cachedownloader, old one was not working
[CODE]APPLICATION FORMULAR For which Spot are you Applicating for : Some of your Work : How long will you be online on Workdays/Weekend : Do you got Skype:[/CODE]
I will be updating this thread Daily. I hope this will go long long looooooong.
Greetings.[/CENTER]

hey lirimoo

APPLICATION FORMULAR

And i can do much more http://prntscr.com/zkkfl http://prntscr.com/zkkh2 Just some proof I am a developer for them
How long will you be online on Workdays/Weekend : 7 days
Do you got Skype: xgodlyrsx

item.title: Desolation - 2 Worlds with shit loads of fun!
item.dc:creator: @Jayden2 Jayden.
item.description:
@Jayden2 wrote:

Good luck with this! You can’t do much with the Epicurus source, it’s complete in every way possible.

To be honest, I don’t think you’d get anywhere with it; try starting with a blank source/client.
